job_history.work_description: Worked with product designers and product managers to design user interactions in applications. Envisioned inspired new products, features and flows. Answered user inquiries regarding computer software and hardware operation. Installed and performed repairs to hardware, software and peripheral equipment, following design and installation specifications. Set up equipment for employee use. Conducted computer diagnostics to investigate and resolve problems and provide technical assistance and support.

Successfully re-branded established dealership, launched new eCommerce website, added six new lines of vehicles, and created new customer engagement strategies. Developed sales and marketing strategy and directly managed over 15 full-time and part-time staff. Streamlined processes in Sales and Service departments using new technology. Managed legal and security policies such as loss prevention and DMV compliance. Negotiated and secured corporate partnerships, including vehicle and trailer maintenance for FreshDirect.com's same-day product (FoodKick).

Provided IT solutions targeting small and medium size businesses in the New York metro area. Solutions to include: Infrastructure/ Network design and implementation, server based technologies and remote support services. Clients included: Bronx Museum of Arts, Cava Construction, Leftfield Pictures.

Managed a staff of ten IT support staff, which provided support for all users employed within Ogilvy North American offices. Constantly developing new standards and IT policy's to improve support reaction time. Key Accomplishment: Lead architect for migrating all Lotus Notes and MS Exchange users to Cloud (Google) Mail. Gathered and analyzed performance metric data.

education.domain: Print Production, Graphic Design Computer Science

skills.name: Technical Support
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in providing technical assistance and support, including troubleshooting, hardware and software repairs, and user inquiries, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: IT Project Management
skills.explanation: Successfully managed multiple IT projects, including infrastructure design and implementation, server-based technologies, and cloud migration, demonstrating expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held various leadership roles, including CTO and IT Manager, with experience in managing teams of up to 15 staff members, indicating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Cloud Computing
skills.explanation: Experience with cloud migration, including leading the migration of Lotus Notes and MS Exchange users to Google Mail, suggesting strong proficiency in cloud computing.

skills.name: Network Design
skills.explanation: Experience in designing and implementing network infrastructure, including server-based technologies, indicating strong proficiency in network design.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Consistently developed new standards and IT policies to improve support reaction time, and gathered and analyzed performance metric data, suggesting strong problem-solving skills.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with users, including answering inquiries and providing technical assistance, indicating strong communication skills.

skills.name: Graphic Design
skills.explanation: Background in graphic design, but limited recent experience, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Print Production
skills.explanation: Background in print production, but limited recent experience, suggesting some practical experience.
